title: Chikito
author: Chikito
created_time: May 26, 2022, 01:01:02 AMLast edit: March 18, 2024, 10:18:56 PM by Chikito
content: I make offers to help you manage spreadsheets and signature services. I also make offers to translate to Indonesia Language. And I'm also used to reviewing and feedback on the website.And my signature avatar is free also for rentWhy me?1. I'm the one who has a good reporter > https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5360879.02. I'm the one who has the most merits, most active, most posts, most earned merit, and most recognized in the forum. > https://bpip.org/Profile?id=9388333. I'm very active in Local boards (50% of total posts), gambling, scam accusation, meta, beginner, and help. > https://ninjastic.space/user/droomiechikitoI will help you build your reputation and increase your prospects.If you are interested;contact me in PM > https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=pm;sa=send;u=938833Telegram > https://t.me/Chickko2345Discord > Chikito#9917

comments.author: int03h
comments.body: So far so good, i think your announcement thread is not so much attractive to get attention.you could add some photos, or you can design your announcement thread by the help of Jayce

comments.author: Chikito
comments.body: Quote from: int03h on June 21, 2022, 12:40:51 AMSo far so good, I think your announcement thread is not so much attractive to get attention.you could add some photos, or you can design your announcement thread by the help of JayceI don't need that because that's all only I have. I just make it simple, if someone is interested in what I have, they will message me.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Glad to see Indonesians here offering services, I'll just give you a little feedback on this topic (of course from my POV). First of all, before offering services, you should have portfolios to convince potential clients that your services are good services for them. For signature campaign management and website reviews can seem a little hard to come by, but for translation, it shouldn't be hard to have.You can make a translation of a project topic (announcement) that is on the Announcements (Altcoins) board, then post it on our local board. Apart from that, you can also collect your portfolio by translating a project article on Medium and then reposting it on your Medium page.As you're a good poster on this forum, we have 2 campaigns for review/test at the moment, i suggest you to participate there and then you can make your work there as your portfolio.- Utopia P2P Ecosystem ðŸ’Ž | Review Campaign ðŸ”Ž| Participate Now!- [PAID TESTERS NEEDED] Zenland Marketplace | Up to $30 (open)That's all my feedback, hopefully in the future we will see people who will use your services, and don't forget, you also have to look for them, I mean don't just stay on this topic.

comments.author: Chikito
comments.body: Quote from: MAAManda on December 22, 2022, 04:40:42 AMThat's all my feedback, hopefully in the future we will see people who will use your services, and don't forget, you also have to look for them, I mean don't just stay on this topic.Thanks for the feedback, I'm not too insistent to search for any project here, I just make it simple, I would if I could.Quote from: MAAManda on December 22, 2022, 04:40:42 AMAs you're a good poster on this forum, we have 2 campaigns for review/test at the moment, I suggest you to participate there and then you can make your work there as your portfolio.I also don't have much experience testing altcoin wallets, or exchanges like you prove because I am not a trader who is always active in the market. And, thanks for sharing, maybe next time if I'm used to it.
